context: where the instructions on how to work the controls, read lies, read green slopes etc.??
response: There should be a read.me file on the disc.  "Also look under options.  This is a very intuitive game.  You have to have patience with the putting.  Difficult to learn the pace of the putts.

context: does this game include war of chifes and asian dynasties?
response: You can get "Age of Empires - Asian Dynasties" on a separate disc. The "Age of Empires III" is just the standard game. I'm not sure if "Age of Empires - War Chiefs" is available for the Mac. They are fun games and I can't wait until they come out with "Age of Empires IV" hopefully for a Mac.

context: does it have av and power cord
response: This is a question that you should ask the individual seller.  Some will include A/V and power cords, others will not.  If they are of interest to you, you might want to also ask about jumper pak, expansion pak, expansion bay cover, controller, manual, original box, games, etc.

context: can this work as a bluetooth controller for a mac?
response: Hi there, This item is only compatible with a Sony PS3, it will not work with a MacBook. Thank you!

context: Looks like just what I need! But why does it come with a USB cable? It doesn't seem as if it would need one.
response: I believe that the USB cable is for the controller to be synced to the XBOX when you attach the adapter.

context: Is it possible to hold a standard 3ds, 6-7 games, and a charger?
response: It will hold games but no room for a charger
It comes with a very long cord, 10 feet(I measured it)...and the cable is not like the plastic ones, it is more like a nylon cord. Great quality for the price

context: hey guys does this fit the newer model vita? i have that one and im having trouble finding good accessories
response: Yes, this is for the Vita PCH-2000 which is the new slim model. The original Vita is the PCH-1000.
